passes.description: Ensures the order of headings is semantically correct

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div:nth-child(1) > section:nth-child(4) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > section > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > div > div:nth-child(2) > div:nth-child(2) > h3
html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > main > article > header:nth-child(1) > h1
html > body > div:nth-child(6) > div:nth-child(2) > div > div > main > article > div:nth-child(2) > div > section > div > div > div > div > div > div > div > h2:nth-child(2)
